backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing authorization, user profiles, contacts, birthday range checks, and gift‑plan storage with CRUD utilities.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to new format by adding empty gift‑plan maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping gift‑related UI features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light and dark color palettes and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app handling authentication, profile setup, and tabs for Upcoming, Contacts, and Gifts.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Form component for creating and editing contacts with validation for dates, birth year, and notes.
Displays, filters, creates, edits, and deletes contacts using hooks and dialog components. Handles loading, error states, and shows a searchable list of contacts.
frontend/src/components/GiftPlanForm.tsx: Form component for creating or editing gift plans tied to contacts. Validates input, submits via hooks, and supports status, budget, and notes fields.
frontend/src/components/GiftsManager.tsx: Lists, edits, deletes, and marks birthday gift plans as sent, combining contact data with plan data. Includes loading/error handling and a form modal for plan creation and editing.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides login/logout button using Internet Identity hooks and clears query cache on logout. Shows loading and authenticated states with UI icons.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter and save their name. Validates input and submits profile data via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/UpcomingDashboar: Displays upcoming birthdays within a selectable time window and supports searching. Separates today’s birthdays and upcoming ones with loading/error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, reinitializing on identity changes. Invalidates dependent queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useContacts.ts: React Query hooks for listing, creating, updating, and deleting contacts using the actor API and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useGiftPlans.ts: Provides hooks to list and mutate birthday gift plans, calling actor methods and refreshing gift plan queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking using Dfinity AuthClient.
Exposes a hook that fetches upcoming birthdays within a given range via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving the caller’s user profile while managing query state and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Utility functions for formatting birthdays, computing ages, and determining next birthday occurrences.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into human‑readable relative or absolute date strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap that sets up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the main app.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session‑stored parameters, including hash‑based query parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theming (colors, radii, shadows, fonts), custom animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including features, architectural notes, issues, and the current state of a birthday reminder app with planned gift‑sending features.
